SEARCH
Package pt.isel.leic.svlc.pod.cmd

Class PodmanCmd

java.lang.Object
pt.isel.leic.svlc.pod.cmd.PodmanCmd
All Implemented Interfaces:
Podman
public class PodmanCmd extends Object implements Podman
Implements the Podman interface to provide methods for interacting with Podman via command-line interface. This class encapsulates the functionality for creating, starting, stopping, and managing pods and containers using Podman commands.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a PodmanCmd instance with no arguments.

  • Constructor Details

    • PodmanCmd

      public PodmanCmd(String podName, String image, String ports)
      Constructs a PodmanCmd instance with specified pod name, image, and ports.
      Parameters:
      podName - The name of the pod.
      image - The Docker image to be used in the pod.
      ports - The ports to be exposed by the pod.

    • PodmanCmd

      public PodmanCmd()
      Constructs a PodmanCmd instance with no arguments.
